methods.name: set
methods.description: Go directly to the specified page

max.description: Number of last page (must be higher than 'min')

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color (useful when you are using it along with the 'input' prop)

size.description: Button size in CSS units, including unit name

input.description: Use an input instead of buttons

to-fn.description: Generate link for page buttons; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

boundary-numbers.description: Always show first and last page buttons (if not using 'input')

ellipses.description: Show ellipses (...) when pages are available

max-pages.description: Maximum number of page links to display at a time; 0 means Infinite

flat.description: Use 'flat' design for non-active buttons (it's the default option)

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

text-color.desc: Text color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE buttons

active-design.description: The design of the ACTIVE button, similar to the flat/outline/push/unelevated props (but those are used for non-active buttons)

active-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

active-text-color.desc: Text color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

round.description: Makes a circle shaped button for all buttons

rounded.description: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button for all buttons

glossy.description: Applies a glossy effect for all buttons

gutter.description: Apply custom gutter; Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

padding.description: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set

input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the input (if using one)

input-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the input (if using one)

ripple.description: Configure buttons material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object); Does not applies to boundary and ellipsis buttons
